headline: Equinix Stock (EQIX) Partners With Energy Firms to Power Global Data Centers
summary: Equinix, Inc. (NASDAQ:EQIX) is one of the AI Stocks In The Spotlight For Investors. On August 14, the company announced that it is working with leading energy companies to support the needs of Equinix data centers worldwide amid increasing global electricity demands. The move reflects Equinix’s diversified portfolio power strategy to help alleviate potential power constraints […]
